title: News Views - Wearable
summary: Sample app to illustrate some different ways to visualize and get news.
description: Source for this prototype app can be found herehttps://github.com/ascheffe-wp/news-views.gitTest app for illustrating different ways to visualize the news. Currently a globe view and active wallpaper for news. Also a wearable tts playback service.Currently supports:http://www.vice.com/ http://huffingtonpost.com/http://www.usatoday.com/http://www.nytimes.com/http://arstechnica.com/You can navigate the articles in 2 ways. One is fly mode, the default. You can zoom and rotate the globe and then tap the articles to open web views. Each article is made up of a picture and a scrolling headline at the bottom. The other mode is touch, to turn it on hit the plane image in the top right corner. Once in touch mode you can rotate the rows on sphere but no longer zoom or change orientation. Again clicking a article will open it in a web view.
descriptionHTML:
Source for this prototype app can be found here
https://github.com/ascheffe-wp/news-views.git

Test app for illustrating different ways to visualize the news. Currently a globe view and active wallpaper for news. Also a wearable tts playback service.

Currently supports:
http://www.vice.com/
http://huffingtonpost.com/
http://www.usatoday.com/
http://www.nytimes.com/
http://arstechnica.com/

You can navigate the articles in 2 ways. One is fly mode, the default. You can zoom and rotate the globe and then tap the articles to open web views. Each article is made up of a picture and a scrolling headline at the bottom. The other mode is touch, to turn it on hit the plane image in the top right corner. Once in touch mode you can rotate the rows on sphere but no longer zoom or change orientation. Again clicking a article will open it in a web view.
comments: Very cool Looks great and runs fast on the LG G4.
The future of browsing Great interface.
Lg g watch Not enough news feeds to choose from.
I didn't like it. Sorry to slow and now very intuitive
recentChanges: Added a new setting button in top left.
May have pushed it a little so let me know if there a problems
